patthana8.71:4.1: Naniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana8.71:5.1: Naaniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.71:6.1: Naniyyānikañca naaniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana8.71:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
